title: The structure of TiO2-SiO2 sol-gel glasses from neutron diffraction with isotopic substitution of titanium, and 17O and 49Ti solid state NMR with isotopic enrichment
abstract: Reveals the power of advanced structural methods in the context of contemporary materials research; this was, at the time, the most detailed study of the atomic-scale structure of a sol-gel glass undertaken. It remains a beacon and has been cited (e.g. in a review by AC Hannon) as an example of what can be achieved when a multidisciplinary approach is taken.  In this case, the combination of careful chemistry with cutting-edge physical experimental methods

      Reveals the power of advanced structural methods in the context of contemporary materials research; this was, at the time, the most detailed study of the atomic-scale structure of a sol-gel glass undertaken. It remains a beacon and has been cited (e.g. in a review by AC Hannon) as an example of what can be achieved when a multidisciplinary approach is taken.  In this case, the combination of careful chemistry with cutting-edge physical experimental methods.</dc:description><dc:format>application/pdf</dc:format><dc:identifier>http://kar.kent.ac.uk/848/1/structure_of_TiO2-SiO2_sol_gel_from_ND_with_istopic_substitution.pdf</dc:identifier><dc:language>en</dc:language><dc:publisher>American Chemical Society</dc:publisher><dc:relation>http://pubs.acs.org/doi/abs/10.1021/jp049053j?journalCode=jpcbfk&quickLinkVolume=108&quickLinkPage=10872&volume=108</dc:relation><dc:source>1520-6106</dc:source><dc:subject>Q</dc:subject><dc:subject>QC</dc:subject><dc:title>The structure of TiO2-SiO2 sol-gel glasses from neutron diffraction with isotopic substitution of titanium, and 17O and 49Ti solid state NMR with isotopic enrichment</dc:title><rioxxterms:apc>unknown</rioxxterms:apc><rioxxterms:author>Pickup, David M.</rioxxterms:author><rioxxterms:author>Sowrey, Frank E.</rioxxterms:author><rioxxterms:author>Newport, Robert J.</rioxxterms:author><rioxxterms:author>Gunawidjaja, Philips N.</rioxxterms:author><rioxxterms:author>Drake, Kieran O.</rioxxterms:author><rioxxterms:author>Smith, Mark E.</rioxxterms:author><rioxxterms:project funder_name="notused" >notused</rioxxterms:project><rioxxterms:publication_date>2004</rioxxterms:publication_date><rioxxterms:type>Journal Article/Review</rioxxterms:type><rioxxterms:version>NA</rioxxterms:version><rioxxterms:version_of_record>http://dx.doi.org/10.1021/jp049053j</rioxxterms:version_of_record></rioxx></metadata></record>
